cause.description:
we do yearly walks to raise money to help save abondond and abused animals.this year we had a good turn out.we also try to find people to adopt pets to give them a great home and when you do we pay for some of the foster parents vet bills.
1. animal abuse is WRONG!
2. animals need love and care at all times
3. animals should be fixed to stop more unwanted animals
cause.name: FOAP
